list-item.p: ▪ Target lesion or distal brain lesion

▪ Symptomatic or asymptomatic brain lesion
PFS
OS
▪ Neurological or non-neurological death
▪ Cancer or non-cancer related death
Cognitive Function
▪ HVLT-R (immediate recall, delayed recall, and total recall)
▪ Colour Trail Test (CTT) – a language-free version of the TMT
Quality of Life (QoL)
▪ Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy with Brain Subscale (FACT-BR)
▪ Euro QOL – 5 Dimension – 5 Level (EQ-5D-5L)
Activities of Daily Living (ADL)
▪ Barthel Index of ADLs
Toxicity
▪ Scored using Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE) ver5.0 criteria
▪ Presence of radiation necrosis (asymptomatic or symptomatic)
